Summary: Biochemical reaction from pimozide to 6-hydroxypimozide. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2D6, CYP3A4 or CYP3A5.
Biochemical reaction from pimozide to DHPBI. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP3A7.
Biochemical reaction from pimozide to 5-hydroxypimozide. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A5, CYP2D6 or CYP3A4.
Transport from pimozide to pimozide. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCB1.
